[/quote]

Haha! These prob Arn’t Even Yours? Maybe A few You Bsed? and made in 2 mins? They are still Gay…[/quote]He means you posted in a really old topic that really didn’t need to be brought back up. Now stop being such an ass and shut up.

item.title: Weapon Collection Release
item.dc:creator: @12estlessk0 12estlessk0
item.description:
@12estlessk0 wrote:

[quote=“johnw1, post:7, topic:311610”][quote author=12estlessk0 link=topic=408056.msg3013852#msg3013852 date=1257046075]
im very sorry if this is a noob question but i really do like the weapons they are beautiful but how do i put them on my server ? lol
[/quote]

copy the code and put it in your class8.java in your CLIENT.
Dl the models and put them in your models folder then go in-game and SAY:

add model ****

for each one (replace **** with each of the models you add ie: add model 9130 )[/quote]

not workin idk what i did lol do i just put this code after the last thing in my class 8 or wat?

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Collection Release
item.dc:creator: @Pigrear Pigrear
item.description:
@Pigrear wrote:

Sweet. Although the only one i would think about using is the Guthix Gs. Its a bit big though. I would have tryed to make it a closer size to the other gs. Otherwise pretty good.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Collection Release
item.dc:creator: @johnw1 johnw1
item.description:
@johnw1 wrote:

12estlessk0:

im very sorry if this is a noob question but i really do like the weapons they are beautiful but how do i put them on my server ? lol

copy the code and put it in your class8.java in your CLIENT.
Dl the models and put them in your models folder then go in-game and SAY:

add model ****

for each one (replace **** with each of the models you add ie: add model 9130 )

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Collection Release
item.dc:creator: @johnw1 johnw1
item.description:
@johnw1 wrote:

Heres many swords I made for my server.

If you dont like em- dont use them!

Pics:

Saradomin Longsword:

Pking Mace:

Guthix Godsword:

Maiden Blade:

Fun Weapon- Chainsaw

Class8 Code:

[CODE]if(i == 15159) // ItemID
{

class8.anInt190 = 488;
